name: breadbin-legacy
tagline: It's 2013, time to make games on the Commodore 64.
body:
# breadbin-legacy
Creating video games on the **Commodore 64** in _pure assembly language_ has never been so much **FUN**.

## Care to help with the wiki?
[Commodore 64 Assembly Language for Game Programmers (wiki)](https://github.com/cbmeeks/breadbin-legacy/wiki)

[Commodore 64 Color Memory](https://github.com/cbmeeks/breadbin-legacy/wiki/Color-Memory)

[Commodore 64 Screen Memory](https://github.com/cbmeeks/breadbin-legacy/wiki/Screen-Memory)

[Commodore 64 Suggested Memory Configurations](https://github.com/cbmeeks/breadbin-legacy/wiki/Suggested-Memory-Configurations)

### Contact Me

[@cbmeeks](https://twitter.com/intent/user?screen_name=cbmeeks")
